The qualities of a wise person living at: They do not neglect their mother, father, and ancestors
They venerate them in accord with the teaching
They remember what they have done
The qualities of a person of settled fai: They venerate the homeless renunciates, the mendicant spiritual practitioners
The quality of a person who is rid of th: They enjoy a world of grace.
